name: WanLinja
description:
You must slash through incoming enemies to protect your core. But be careful. The red ones can also slash your line. 

The words are written in the script I made for toki pona (a conlang). The core is "lawa" aka brain/control, the player is "jan" aka person, the red ones are "akesi" aka lizard, the purple ones are "kala" aka fish... Honestly like its style :)

ps: it's a window. so you can just have it on the side while you listening to smth and what not :)

pps: added a timer for those that like highscore stufff ;P   (my highscore is 143)
